page.title: 05HOMELIFE
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LISA(7yrs) I get up at 7.30. For breakfast I have cereal,toast,orange juice and a boiled egg.I get ready for school and 8.35 my mother drives me to school on the way to her job at a building society office. Before school starts at 8.50 l play in the playground with my friends.I spend the morning doing Maths,English,P.E. or Handwriting.At 10.30 we have a break and at 12.00 lunch.I buy my lunch from the school cafeteria.After lunch I can paint,draw or write on a given topic.Break is at 2.45 and school ends at 3.30. At home I get changed and go out to play until my father comes home from work in a tool making factory.I have a cooked meal with my parents and older sisters.I go to bed about 8.00.
